title: Kerry: Video monitoring to ease Jerusalem holy site tensions
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Looking to reduce tensions at a Jerusalem holy site that set off weeks of Mideast violence, U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry announced Sat...
